00026 #include "log.h"
00027 #include <string.h>
00028 #include <stdlib.h>
00029 #include <stdint.h>
00030 #include <inttypes.h>
00031 #include <stdio.h>
00032 #include <stdarg.h>
00033 #include <fcntl.h>
00034 
00035 const char *
00036 log_priority_to_str(const int priority)
00037 {
00038   switch (priority) {
00039     case NFC_LOG_PRIORITY_ERROR:
00040       return  "error";
00041     case NFC_LOG_PRIORITY_INFO:
00042       return  "info";
00043     case NFC_LOG_PRIORITY_DEBUG:
00044       return  "debug";
00045     default:
00046       break;
00047   }
00048   return "unknown";
00049 }
00050 
00051 
00052 #ifdef LOG
00053 
00054 #include "log-internal.h"
00055 
00056 void
00057 log_init(const nfc_context *context)
00058 {
00059 #ifdef ENVVARS
00060   char str[32];
00061   sprintf(str, "%"PRIu32, context->log_level);
00062   setenv("LIBNFC_LOG_LEVEL", str, 1);
00063 #else
00064   (void)context;
00065 #endif
00066 }
00067 
00068 void
00069 log_exit(void)
00070 {
00071 }
00072 
00073 void
00074 log_put(const uint8_t group, const char *category, const uint8_t priority, const char *format, ...)
00075 {
00076   char *env_log_level = NULL;
00077 #ifdef ENVVARS
00078   env_log_level = getenv("LIBNFC_LOG_LEVEL");
00079 #endif
00080   uint32_t log_level;
00081   if (NULL == env_log_level) {
00082     // LIBNFC_LOG_LEVEL is not set
00083 #ifdef DEBUG
00084     log_level = 3;
00085 #else
00086     log_level = 1;
00087 #endif
00088   } else {
00089     log_level = atoi(env_log_level);
00090   }
00091 
00092   //  printf("log_level = %"PRIu32" group = %"PRIu8" priority = %"PRIu8"\n", log_level, group, priority);
00093   if (log_level) { // If log is not disabled by log_level=none
00094     if (((log_level & 0x00000003) >= priority) ||   // Global log level
00095         (((log_level >> (group * 2)) & 0x00000003) >= priority)) { // Group log level
00096 
00097       va_list va;
00098       va_start(va, format);
00099       log_put_internal("%s\t%s\t", log_priority_to_str(priority), category);
00100       log_vput_internal(format, va);
00101       log_put_internal("\n");
00102       va_end(va);
00103     }
00104   }
00105 }
00106 
00107 #endif // LOG
